issue.title: [CF 459] Not working after DC in arena. Tried EVERYTHING
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.260, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1

Installed Version

5.0.2

Description

I was in a 2v2 match when I suddenly got a random disconnect. After that disconnect the addon is not working at all, and I tried to reinstall it and reset all settings.

Steps to Reproduce

Would be nice if u had an answer of how I can fix it, overall I love the addon.

Installed Addons

Afflicted 3 - Afflicted3 2.2.1 AtlasLoot Enhanced - v6.05.04 AzCastBar - 11.09.25 Bartender4 - 4.4.20.1 BattlegroundTargets - 40300-9 Cooldowns - 1.3.6 Deadly Boss Mods - 4.10.10 Doom_CooldownPulse - 1.2.9 Enemy Ability Bar - v1.0.12-beta Gladiminish - v1.0 Gladius - v2.0.16-beta Grid - 4.3.2.1458 Guild Mass Inviter - Guild Mass Inviter 1.3 Guild Recruiter - Guild Recruiter 3.0 InterruptBar - v1.33 Juked - Juked 1.3.8 LoseControl - LoseControl 4.3 MoveAnything - 12.2.3 nUI -- Stats (Merged Omen3/Recount info panel) - nUI -- Stats (Merged Omen3/Recount info panel) -- V5.07.19 OmniCC - 4.3.2 Prat 3.0 - 3.4.25 Quartz - 3.0.8 Recount - v4.3.0c release SafeQueue - v1.26 Shaman Friend - Version2.33-r42 ShieldsUp - 4.3.0.122 SpellAlerter - v2.15 TellMeWhen - 5.0.2 Tidy Plates - 6.5.7 Titan Panel - 5.0.12.40300


> Posted by CurseForge user skeeeig | Imported from CurseForge issue #459 | Raw

comments.body:
Please upload your saved variables so that I may further diagnose the issue.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Didnt quite get what u ment, but its the "Tellmewhen" Addon. I got dced in arena, and now its not working at all. First time I installed it I didnt need to configurate anything, it just worked perfectly as I wanted it to be. (showing my debuffs in the middle of my screen, whatever it was.) If I am in a kidney-shot, it appeared in my screen and the timer of it. If one of my teammates was in a smokebomb it showed up in the middle of my screen. That's the thing I want back, things like that not only the few I mentioned.

Now after my DC in arena nothing is working... I tried to reinstall, other versions and delete the tellmewhen options inside the "WTF" -folder.

Is there any chances that I can get the addon back as it was?


> Posted by CurseForge user skeeeig

I'm well aware of what addon you submitted a ticket for. Please submit a new ticket using the proper ticket template ( http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/create-ticket/ ) and follow the directions there to upload your saved variables.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Just figured its working totally fine on one of my other characters, do you know of anything I can do to get those settings on my shaman?


> Posted by CurseForge user skeeeig

I still need you to do what I told you to do in my last response.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
